attributes.action: Add a "I disagree with this petition" button to every petition
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: A petition would be more meaningful and democratic if it could show the relative numbers both for and against the petition.

rejection.details: Please see the FAQ page at http://www.petitions.pm.gov.uk
reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
